page.title: 17A TYPICAL SATURDAY
page.content: MY NAME IS{JULIE MACDONALD}AND I LIVE IN A THREE STOREY HOUSE IN{CRAIG DHUBH {TERRACE, KINMYLIES. I WAKE ABOUT{HALF PAST SEVEN.}I THEN READ TILL ABOUT{0835}AND THEN GO DOWN STAIRS TO WATCH W.A.C.(WIDE AWAKE CLUB).AT{0915,I HAVE MY BREAKFAST OF FROSTIES,TOAST AND MARMALADE AND BREAK-FAST ORANGE.I THEN GO BACK UPSTAIRS TO WATCH T.V. FOR AN HOUR.AT ABOUT{1100, I GET DRESSED,READY TO GO OUT.{USUALLY I TAKE MY TENNIS RACKET OUT{AND PLAY SQUASH AGAINST A WALL.}I PLAY FOR AN HOUR OR LESS THEN I HAVE MY LUNCH. FOR LUNCH I HAVE,A BACON SANDWICH OR A HAMBURGER ROLL. AT{1400 I GO TO CALL FOR MY FRIEND AND WE PLAY {"GOALIES"(THAT'S WHEN ONE PERSON GOES {IN GOALS AND THE OTHER PERSON GETS 5 {GOALS,THEN SHE'S IN}GOALS).I HAVE MY TEA AT{1700 AFTER WHICH I WATCH T.V. FOR MOST OF THE EVENING.
